org.jredis.connector
Interface Protocol

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProtocolBase, SynchProtocol
public interface Protocol

Protocol is effectively a Message factory. Implementations of this interface provides Message objects that read and write according to a specific Redis protocol specification.

Implementations may use this interface to address issues regarding buffer management. [TODO: document me!]

Since:
alpha.0
Version:
alpha.0, 04/02/09
Author:
Joubin Houshyar (alphazero@sensesay.net)

createResponse

Response createResponse(Command cmd)
                        throws ProviderException,
                               ClientRuntimeException
Creates a response object for the Command specified.

Note that this Response object has not yet been read.

Parameters:
cmd - the Command that will be responded to.
Returns:
the response object that is ready to be read from the network connection.
Throws:
ClientRuntimeException - if the command is invalid for this version of the protocol
ProviderException - if the command is not implemented
See Also:
Response
